title: Language Proficiency Enhancement Course Based on Online Distance Learning Design

context.additional_context: Language learning support program for enhancing job efficiency among current practitioners, offering personalized design and feedback through learner data analysis.

learning_goals: Learners will be able to design personalized learning pathways based on activity data within an LMS (Learning Management System).
Learners achieve at least 20% improvement in language proficiency (vocabulary, grammar, communication) based on monthly assessments
Learners autonomously diagnose their learning patterns and develop improvement plans using learning analytics tools
Learners engage in at least three meaningful collaborative learning activities within peer interaction networks
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
